definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: navel-string (cf. Aram. [[שׁוּרָא]] Ez Eze 16:4 Targum, 43ro0, Ar.sur=un, all id.);—sf. [[לאׂ כָרַּת שָׁרֵּח]] Ez Eze 16:4 (Ges:§ 22 s Kö:ii. 1. 45) thy navel-string was nut cut; questioned are: [[שָׁרֶָּךָ]] Pr 3:8 (De al. navel, synechd. for body, ‖[[עַחְמוֹתֶתךָ ]]; LXX tw=| sw/mati/; sou, cf. SyrVer, Clericus Bi Frankenberg [[בְּשָֽׂרְךָ]], Ew Hi Kmp al. [[שְׁאֵרְךָ]], Toy either); [[שָׂרְךָ]] Ct So 7:3 (LXX o)mfala/v sou; ‖[[בִּטְנֵח ]]), = [[שָׁרֵּח]] Thes al.; now oft. interpreted as = vulva, cf. Ar. sir=un secret part, Hi Stickel Buhl öttli, noticed also by Thes, but Arabism dub., v. Bu.
